item.title: About St. Matthew's
item.description:
Our Mission

To know Christ and to make Him known.

This simple calling is at the heart of everything we do. It means growing in our relationship with Jesus Christ and sharing His love with others.

To Know Christ

Knowing Christ is more than just learning about Himâ€”it’s a living relationship with the Son of God. This relationship grows through prayer, studying the Bible, participating in the sacraments, and living in Christian community. As Jesus said, “And this is eternal life, that they know you, the only true God, and Jesus Christ whom you have sent” (John 17:3).
